original: Well... I mean... sometimes they're hurt so bad, there's nothing I can do. The human body is very hard to, um, hard to "fix."
translation: 嗯…我的意思是…有时他们伤的太重，我会束手无策。人的身体太复杂了。只能尽力去治疗。

original: Join? I was forced into service. I worked in a hospital before I was in the army. They put the gun in my hand.
translation: 参军？我是被迫的。我以前曾在一家医院工作，它们硬把枪塞进我的手里。

original: Well, I just thought...
translation: 呃，我只是想说…

original: Yeah... all the time. I was a doctor, so it was my job to try and make everyone feel better.
translation: 是啊…总是这样。我是一个医生，这是我的工作，我试着让大家感觉更好。

original: I guess so. I can't believe they went ahead with the nukes. I mean, they wiped everything out! How stupid could they be?
translation: 我想是的，我不相信他们竟然使用核武器。我的意思是，他们毁掉了一切！他们怎么能这么蠢！

original: Well... I just thought, ummm... we should get to know each other. I mean after all, we're watching each other's backs. So...
translation: 嗯…我只是想，嗯… 我们应该互相了解。我的意思是，我们要相互依靠，所以…

original: Aw, don't worry. I always pick good friends.
translation: 啊，不用担心。我总是选择最好的朋友。

original: Maybe we should just stay up here then! I hated when it was like that!
translation: 也许我们应该待在这里！我讨厌那样。

original: So you promise to fix me if I get hurt?
translation: 所以如果我受伤的话，你答应为我治疗？

original: That's funny, sounds like the way people can be too!
translation: 那很可笑，听起来就像是人都可以！

original: Sigh. I wish that they could fix that. I hated being down there.
translation: 哎。我希望它们能够解决。我讨厌去那下面。

original: So if I get hurt, will I die?
translation: 那么，如果我受伤了，我会死吗？

original: Wow! So you got to ride horses? Real, living horses? I've never even seen a real living horse. What are they like?
translation: 哇！所以，你会骑马？真的，活生生的马？我从来没见过真正的马。它们是什么样子?

original: Yeah. I mean, everything was all blown up and really dirty. There were lotsa sick people everywhere too, and lotsa people crying.
translation: 是啊。我的意思是，一切都被炸的乱七八糟了。到处都是生病和哭喊的人。

original: How come people still die then after they get hurt even when a doctor is around?
translation: 既然当时医生就在附近，怎么还会有人因为伤重而死？

original: There isn't anyone left to fix anything. Everything's in ruins, people are still fighting to survive and I don't see anything that can change that.
translation: 没有任何人留下来解决问题。一切都被摧毁了，人们仍然为了生存而战斗，我不知道什么办法可以解决此事。

original: Fine, fine. I get the message. You know, you were warmer when you were frozen.
translation: 好的，好的。我明白了。你还是被冻着的时候比较亲切。

original: That about sums it all up. The world is still a huge mess.
translation: 那大概概括了一切。这世界仍然一片混乱。

original: Look, cowboy. We need to work together to get out of here. So like it or not, you're stuck with us. You can drop the "lone gunman" routine.
translation: 听着，牛仔。我们必须一起逃出这里。不管你喜不喜欢，你和我们在一条船上了。你可以丢掉“孤胆枪手”这个称号了。

original: Ever pull the trigger on that gun? You know, ever kill someone?
translation: 你曾经扣下过扳机吗？你曾经杀过人吗？

original: Same as when you were down there you mean?
translation: 当时你怎么想的?

original: No, I mean what's your deal? Where are you from? We don't know anything about you.
translation: 不，我的意思是你想怎么样？你从哪儿来？我们不知道任何你的事。

original: You don't seem the soldier type, Tercorien. Why the heck did you join the army in the first place?
translation: 你好象不是当兵的料，特克里安。你究竟为什么要参军上前线？

original: You know, for a little lady, you're pretty smart. I just hope you were smart enough to pick the right horse when you broke this stranger out.
translation: 你知道，作为一个小女人，你算是很聪明了。我只希望你够聪明到和人混熟时能选对马。

original: Just stay out of the way of my bullets when I'm shooting the aliens, and you'll do just fine.
translation: 当我射这群外星人的时候你只需要学会别挡我的子弹就行，你会做得到的。

original: Well, see, that's your problem. You thought, but you're wrong. Now, isn't there some bandages you should be makin' or somethin'?
translation: 好吧，看，那是你的问题。你想过了，但你错了。现在，你是不是该弥补下还是干点别的什么？

original: Well, I guess if you find the right one, it'll be your friend for life. Find the wrong one, and it'd rather throw you than carry you.
translation: 嗯，我想如果你找到一个合适的，它将是你一生的朋友。找到不合适的，它就会拖累你而不是帮助你。

original: Good, I aim to keep it that way. I'll work with you, but I'm not here to make friends.
translation: 好的，我要保持这样。我会和你一起工作，但是我不在这里交朋友。

original: Look, you do the healin' and I do the killin'. Besides that, what do we have to talk about?
translation: 听着，你治伤，我杀人。除此之外，我们还有什么好谈的？

original: Well, yeah. I suppose you could say that.
translation: 好吧，是的。我想你可以那么说。

original: My story? Same as you. I don't know where the heck I am and I want to go home.
translation: 我的故事？和你一样。我也不知道我到底在哪，还有我想要回家。

original: Yeah? What is it? Spit it out.
translation: 是吗？是什么？说来听听。

original: How are you holding up?
translation: 你还撑得住吗？

original: I could use one of those stimpaks if you don't mind.
translation: 如果你没意见，我就用下治疗针。

original: Would you mind watching our backs?
translation: 你不介意掩护一下我们吧？

original: If it means we all live through this, then yeah. Be happy to.
translation: 如果这意味着我们都能全身而退的话，那么好吧。乐意效劳。

original: Status report?
translation: 有什么情况？

original: Who the hell knows, these controls are just a mess.
translation: 鬼知道！这些开关简直让人一头雾水。

original: I'm working on it, all right?
translation: 我正在努力，行了吧？

original: Fuck you and this whole fucking situation.  They'll work when they work.
translation: 他妈的一团糟，需要它们时就能运作了。

original: What's this thing do?
translation: 这玩意是做什么用的？

original: Hmm, looks like I'm at the helm.  I'll have these controls figured out in no time at all.
translation: 哦，看起来这是舵轮室，我马上就能弄明白应该如何操控这些开关。

original: Can we hit that thing with our death ray?
translation: 我们能用死光攻击那玩意吗？

original: I think I have that ship targeted, but you'll have to find the firing control.
translation: 我想我瞄准了那飞船，但你得找到发射开关。

original: How you holding up Sergeant?
translation: 你的状况如何，中士？

original: I have these buttons pointing at that big blob, I think that's right.
translation: 我看这些按钮都指着那个大粒子团，我觉得那应该没错了。

original: I was scared for a while, but this is awesome!
translation: 我被吓了一跳，不过这真棒！

original: Do you think you'll be able to assist us medically if we need it?
translation: 如果我们需要医疗，你能帮助我们吗？

original: I'd really like to, but when I woke up on this ship for the first time all of my medical gear was gone.
translation: 我真想，可是当我在飞船上第一次醒来的时候，我的医疗装备就都不见了。

original: I saw that the aliens on this ship have some sort of viscous stuff they slather onto wounds; some kind of biological gel.
translation: 我看到飞船上的外星人用一些粘性物质涂抹伤口—一种生物凝胶。

original: Get me some of that, and I might be able to mess around with it, make some sort of Adapted Biogel we can use on ourselves.
translation: 给我一些，我捣一下，制造一些我们能自己使用的适应性凝胶。

original: Sure, here you go. They should work pretty well... but watch out for side effects.
translation: 当然，给你。它应该很有效…但要注意副作用。

original: Could you make me some Adapted Biogel?
translation: 你能给我提供一些改良型生物凝胶吗？

original: I'm still going to need more alien biogel before I can make any more of the healing gel.
translation: 我还需要更多的外星生物凝胶才能继续制造医疗凝胶。

original: Could you make me some Adapted Biogel?
translation: 你能给我提供一些改良型生物凝胶吗？

original: No way.
translation: 没门。

original: Fine. I'll be waiting for you to change your mind when your equipment starts to fall apart.
translation: 好吧，我等着你的装备烂掉的时候改变主意。

original: Fine, I give in. I'll pay.
translation: 好吧，我认输了，我会付钱的。

original: All right. Let me see what you have.
translation: 好吧，让我看看你有什么。

original: No way, Somah. This is ridiculous.
translation: 没门，索玛。这太荒唐了。

original: Suit yourself. Maybe you can ask one of the aliens to help you. Or, when you come to your senses, you can ask me.
translation: 随你的便，也许你可以请外星人来帮你。或者，当你明白过来时，可以找我。

original: Yeah, I guess you're right.
translation: 是的，我想你是对的。

original: Good, I'm glad we see eye to eye. Now, let me see what you need fixed.
translation: 好，很高兴我们的看法一致。现在，让我看看你要修些什么。

original: You've got to be kidding me.
translation: 你一直在耍我。

original: Oh come off it, kid. If and when we get off this ship, I'm going to need something to keep me alive down there.
translation: 省省吧，孩子。如果我们离开这艘飞船，我需要些能让我活下去的东西。

original: You and I both know that there's no handouts in the Wasteland. It's every woman for herself. Take it or leave it.
translation: 你和我都知道废墟上没有施舍，人人都为自己，要不要随你。

original: Yeah, fine, whatever. Just take a look.
translation: 嗯，好吧，随便了。看一看吧。

original: Sure, I'd be glad to.
translation: 当然，我很乐意。

original: Well, given the circumstances, doesn't that seem kind of pointless?
translation: 呃，在这种情况下，这不是显得很没有意义么？

original: Maybe to you it does, but hey... I gotta think about the future. If we get back down there and I'm broke, how am I going to survive?
translation: 也许对你来说是这样。但是…我必须考虑未来。如果我们回到那里，我破产了，怎么生存？

original: You know as well as I do that there are no handouts in the Wasteland.
translation: 你和我都清楚，废土上没有施舍。

original: Since you seem so familiar with my gear, do you know how to repair it?
translation: 你看起来很熟悉我的装备，你知道怎么修理它们吗？

original: Actually, I do. I used to tinker with all sorts of junk back home.
translation: 确实，我是的，我以前经常在家修理一些破烂。

original: I'd be glad to take a look at what you need fixed, but it's going to cost you some caps.
translation: 我很乐意帮你修理，但这要花费一些瓶盖。

original: Sure. Let me see.
translation: 好的，我看看。

original: Got some more gear for you to fix.
translation: 我还有些装备要你帮忙修理。

original: Yeah. So, you want to take me up on it or not?
translation: 是啊，所以，你想这么做吗?

original: Are you still insisting on charging me caps for repairs?
translation: 你仍然坚持要收瓶盖才能帮我修理吗？

original: What the hell are those aliens doing in there?
translation: 那些外星人在搞什么?

original: Look at all these cryogenic chambers. They must be planning to fill them all with specimens from our planet!
translation: 看看这些冷冻舱。它们肯定计划用我们地球上的标本去填满它们。

original: Is that some kind of operating room? Wait a minute... what the... no... NO!
translation: 那是某种手术室吗？等一下…这是什么…不…不！

original: That's my squad in there!  What the hell are the aliens doing to them?
translation: 那是我在那的战友！外星人到底对他们做了什么可怕的事？

original: You green bastards!  Get your hands off them!
translation: 你们这群绿杂种！把你的手拿开！

original: There has to be a way to release their containment seal!  Maybe there's a button or something on this console.
translation: 一定有办法脱离他们的控制！或许会有个按钮或其他什么在那控制台上。

original: How do you like that, you fucks!? How's it feel to be on the other end for a change!
translation: 你很喜欢这样吧，杂种！？享受下另外一边立场的感觉怎么样吧！

original: Experiment on this, you sons of bitches!
translation: 试试这个，你这狗杂碎！

original: Oh my god... no... I can't believe they did this to you. Why wasn't I here sooner? I could have stopped them.
translation: 我的上帝啊…不…我无法相信你竟然做出这样的事。为什么我没有更早到这里？我可以阻止这发生…

original: That's it. I'm sick of running. Let's finish these aliens off and get the hell home.
translation: 就是那样。我已经厌烦了逃跑。让我们送这些外星人滚回地狱里去。

original: No... it can't be. Is this their plan? To capture THIS many people from earth? Oh my god.
translation: 不…不可能。这就是它们的计划？从地球上捕捉人类？哦，我的上帝。

original: They're flanking us from behind.  Quick, find some cover.
translation: 它们正从后面包抄我们两侧。快，寻找掩护。

original: So that's the generator.  Now how the heck do we destroy it?
translation: 那就是发电机。我们现在该怎么摧毁这鬼东西？

original: Get a load of this!
translation: 拿上这个！

original: Would ya look at that...
translation: 你看那个……

original: Wow!
translation: 哇哦！

original: I was hoping you'd know what to do next.
translation: 我希望你知道下一步该做什么。

original: Kid, I think I made it pretty clear that my advice became irrelevant once we got out of that cell they stuck us in.
translation: 孩子，我很清楚地告诉过你在我们离开了牢房后我的建议就无关紧要了。

original: I'm happy to tag along and help you out, but I got NO interest in leading this operation.
translation: 我很高兴能跟着你帮助你，但我没兴趣指挥这次行动。

original: I'm flying by the seat of my pants here.
translation: 我在靠着自己的直觉驾驶。

original: Ha ha. Very funny.
translation: 哈哈。很有趣。

original: If you've got nothing, then ask the kid. She's been helpful so far.
translation: 如果你什么也不懂，问问那孩子，她已经帮我们很多。

original: Now we take over the ship.
translation: 现在我们接管了这艘船了！

original: Okay, if you say so. Lead the way, kid.
translation: 好吧，按你所说，带路吧，孩子。

original: Sorry, I should get the door. Hang on, okay?
translation: 抱歉，我会搞定这门的。稍等，好吗？

original: Not really the time for gawking...
translation: 没时间发楞了…

original: Didn't think I'd ever see something like this.
translation: 没想到我会见到这样的东西。

original: That's really something. Almost enough to make you forget we're running for our lives up here...
translation: 那可真太不起了。几乎都让你忘了我们正在逃命…

original: It's so pretty, isn't it?
translation: 这可真漂亮，不是吗？

original: One of those shots must have hit the core, all power is down!
translation: 肯定有一发命中了中枢，所有的动力都停止了！

original: Lights out! They must have hit something and now nothing is working!
translation: 灯灭了！它们一定击中了什么，所有设备都停止运转了！

original: How's the jammer holding?
translation: 干扰器运行得如何？

original: It's holding fine for now, I guess.  It should help with the bastards teleporting onto the ship.
translation: 我猜它现在运行得好极了，它能够帮你传送到飞船顶部。

original: What have you got there?
translation: 你从那搞到了什么？

original: Oh man, I don't know... a teleport jammer, maybe? Right, space ships have those, don't they?
translation: 哦，伙计，我不知道… 或许是一台传送干扰器？对，飞船上有，没错吧？

original: Yeah, sure. a teleport jammer.
translation: 是的，当然。一台传送干扰器。

original: Hey, don't forget to put on the Astronaut's Suit before starting the decompression sequence.
translation: 嗨，在减压前不要忘了穿上宇航服。

original: Yeah, I can see that. I'll get us through.
translation: 好的，我明白了。我会帮大家度过难关的。

original: Okay, okay. Just trying to lend a hand.
translation: 好吧，好吧。帮把手。

original: I got it!  The deathray is working and will be fully charged in 30 seconds!
translation: 知道了！死光正在运行，还需要30秒才能充能完毕！

original: All right, it's all ready to fire! Push your big blue button and lets end this.
translation: 好极了，开火准备完毕！按下那个蓝色的大按钮，让我们来终结它。

original: 70%, we need to end this fast.
translation: 70%，我们得尽快搞定。

original: This ship's half dead and if that death ray isn't online soon we're dead right along with it.
translation: 飞船快被打烂了，如果死光不能马上就绪，我们就要和飞船一起完蛋了。

original: 20% and plummeting, we're losing systems like crazy.
translation: 20%，持续下降中，系统快要崩溃了。

original: We're at about 70%.
translation: 耐久度约为70%。

original: Ship's at 50%, we can't take much more of this.
translation: 飞船耐久度50%，我们挨不了几炮了。

original: 20%.  I hope you've got a plan.
translation: 20%。我希望你另有打算。

original: Can't be sure if I'm reading this right, but it looks like they're hitting us pretty hard.  Hull integrity is at about 90%.
translation: 我不确定这读数是否正确，不过看起来它们正在猛攻我们。飞船耐久度约为90%。

original: Hull integrity looks to be about 80% and falling.
translation: 飞船耐久度约为80%，持续下降中。

original: The hull's at around 60%, we need that death ray online now.
translation: 飞船耐久度约为60%，我们需要死光准备完毕。

original: 40%, do something.
translation: 40%，做点什么。

original: Ship's at 30%.  I hope you have something up your sleeve.
translation: 飞船耐久度30%。你最好抓紧时间。

original: 10%, we're about to lose life support systems!
translation: 10%，我们快要失去生命维持系统了！

original: Looks like they're doing a number on the ship, hull is at 90% and falling.
translation: 看起来它们对飞船造成了伤害，飞船耐久度90%，持续下降中。

original: 80%, you should try one of these consoles, it might be shields or something.
translation: 80%，你应该试试那堆控制终端，可能有护盾或别的什么功能。

original: At about 60%.  Do something.
translation: 飞船耐久度约为60%。做点什么。

original: The ship's at 40%, we're goners.
translation: 飞船耐久度40%，我们死定了。

original: 30%.  This is not good.
translation: 30%。大事不妙。

original: 10% and the ship's failing!
translation: 10%，飞船正在下坠！

original: Watch out, more are coming from behind you. I'll try to block their progress.
translation: 保持警觉，你后面还有更多。我会试着挡住它们。

original: Oh yeah, they definitely know we're here. Don't let them sneak up on you!
translation: 噢耶，它们肯定知道我们在哪。不要让它们偷袭！

original: What's this button.. Whoa! Hey, can you hear me down there?
translation: 这是什么按钮…哇！嗨，你在那能听到我吗。

original: Are you kidding me? That was stupid of them. Now we know they're getting desperate.
translation: 很明显，不是吗？它们在恐吓我们。你能从刚才它的语气里听出来。

original: Pretty effective threat, if you ask me.
translation: 要我说的话，这恐吓挺漂亮。

original: It's obvious, isn't it? They're threatening us. You could tell just by the way he sounded.
translation: 你在开玩笑吗？它们太蠢了，我们知道它们已经要绝望了。

original: Holy SHIT. What was that?
translation: 该死，那是什么？

original: Give me a minute, I'll try to get these doors open for you.
translation: 给我点时间，我会尽快为你打开这些门。

original: Wow, that looks dangerous. See if you can turn it off while I try and figure this door out.
translation: 哇，这看起来好危险。看看在我解决这扇门时你能不能关掉它。

original: Uh-oh. I think they found a way to get to you. I'll try and get the next door open fast!
translation: 噢，我认为它们可能采用了某种限制。我到隔壁去看看能不能更快打开。

original: Hang on! One of these buttons has got to open that door...
translation: 等等！其中一个按钮能打开那扇门…

original: Their radios got quiet all of a sudden. I'd be careful if I were you...
translation: 它们的电台讯号突然消失了。如果我是你，我就会小心点…

original: Okay!
translation: Ok。 !

original: Go, go!
translation: 冲，冲！

original: What are you waiting for?
translation: 你还在等什么?

original: Get a move on!
translation: 抓紧时间！

original: What the hell was that thing? Where are they taking that guy?
translation: 这是什么鸟东西？它们从哪儿抓来那家伙的！

original: What, you've never seen a giant metal claw scoop somebody up and carry him off to who-knows-where?
translation: 什么，你从没见过一个巨大的金属铲子把人抓起来然后扔到什么鬼地方。

original: I don't know where they're taking him, and I'm not interested in staying here long enough to find out.
translation: 我不知道它们正在找他，我不想在这寻找太久。

original: We gotta get out of here, kid. Now.
translation: 我们现在必须离开这里，孩子！

original: More could bust in at any second. Get ready!
translation: 随时都可能有更多家伙冲进来，做好准备！

original: I told you so! Ambush!
translation: 我告诉过你的！有埋伏！

original: We're almost out of here! I'll meet you up ahead. Hurry!
translation: 我们就快能离开这里了！我会在前面和你碰头。快点！

original: What the hell are you doing?! Don't press that!
translation: 你在搞什么鬼？！不要按那个！

original: Elliott... Is that you?  What... What's going on? Where the hell are we?
translation: 艾略特…是你吗？发生了什么？我们在哪？

original: Agh...feels like someone rearranged my insides. What happened to us?
translation: 啊…感觉像是有人重新整合了我的内脏。我们怎么了？

original: We have an objective, soldier! We leave immediately.
translation: 我们有我们的任务，士兵！我们现在就走！

original: I... I guess you're right. Let's get the fuck out of here.
translation: 我…我想你是对的。让我们离开这个鬼地方。

original: Let me ask you something before I decide.
translation: 在我决定之前让我问你几个问题吧。

original: All right. What is it?
translation: 好吧。什么事？

original: Leave them!  Our objective is to destroy the generator.
translation: 别管他们！我们的目标是摧毁发电机。

original: End it... put them out of their misery.
translation: 结束吧…让他们得到解脱！

original: I suppose you're right. Don't worry, they won't feel a thing.
translation: 我想你是对的。别担心，他们不会有感觉的。

original: Revive them and let them fight with us.
translation: 让他们复苏，和我们一起战斗。

original: Just remember they won't be alive long so we need to keep moving as fast as we can.
translation: 记住他们不会活太久，所以我们必须赶快。

original: I'm going to need to watch their vitals carefully as I use the medical console to pump them full of the correct fluids and bring them back.
translation: 我必须观察他们是否复苏，我要用医疗控制台向舱内灌入适当溶液让他们苏醒。

original: When I give the signal, you open the tubes with that switch. Don't open them until I tell you or the results could be unpredictable.
translation: 当我给信号，你就用开关打开管子。直到我示意前不要打开，否则结果将无法想像的。

original: We should just put them out of their misery.
translation: 我们应该把他们从苦难中拯救出来。

original: Yeah, I was considering that too. We can't let the aliens experiment on them any more. It just isn't right.
translation: 是的，我也在想。我们不能让外星人对他们做实验了。这太糟了。

original: But maybe we should give them a chance to fight with us. It's better to die that way than to live through years of agony.
translation: 但也许可以让他们和我们共同战斗，那样的死法至少比在这里活受罪要好。

original: How long can they last if you revive them?
translation: 如果你让他们复苏，他们能坚持多久？

original: I don't know for certain. I can get them on their feet and moving for maybe a few minutes at best.
translation: 我不敢确定。我最多能让他们恢复基本能力并活动上几分钟时间。

original: There's no way for me to tell what the aliens have already subjected them to. I can't understand these readouts. Their pain could be horrible.
translation: 我无法描述他们遭受了那些外星人怎样的对待。我无法理解这些参数。他们的痛苦多半非常骇人。

original: This technology is out of my league so I'm just going to have to improvise. It's the best I can do.
translation: 这技术实在超出我的能力，我只能做到这程度。但我会尽力。

original: I don't know what to do. These guys are the last of my squad... they're my friends.
translation: 我不知道该怎么办。这些伙计是我仅存的战友… 他们是我的伙伴。

original: If I revive them maybe they could help us. I'm not sure they'll last very long, but if we leave them... you saw what the aliens did to the others...
translation: 如果我复苏他们，也许他们能帮助我们。我不确定他们能坚持多久，但如果我们离开他们…你看到了外星人对其他人做了什么…

original: Wait!  I think that's some more of my squad!
translation: 等等！我想那是我的战友！

original: It's Daniels and Beckett!
translation: 是丹尼尔斯和贝克特！

original: There's got to be a way to revive them with their memories intact so they won't attack us on sight.
translation: 一定有办法让他们复苏并恢复记忆，这样他们看到我们就不会攻击了。

original: I think I may be able to use this medical equipment to bring them out of stasis properly.
translation: 我想我可以用这些医疗设备把他们从冬眠室里复苏过来。

original: The aliens have already injected them with all sorts of compounds I don't recognize... I don't know how it will affect them when they awaken.
translation: 我没想到外星人已经给他们注射了这么多的化合物…我不知道它们醒来后会有受到什么影响。

original: The tubes are filled with an oxygen compound to sustain them. If I just shut it down, they won't feel a thing.
translation: 管子里充满了氧气化合物为他们供给。如果只是关掉，他们不会感到异常。

original: That's it then. They're... they're gone.
translation: 就是那样。他们…他们已经逝去了。

original: Rest in peace men. You deserve it.
translation: 安息吧。这是你应得的。

original: Okay, let's see.  This must initiate the thawing process. Blood pressure looks normal.  Heart rate...normal enough.
translation: 好吧，让我们看看。必须启动解冻程序。血压看来正常，心率…足够好了。

original: Whew. I hope to god this works... Open the tubes. If I did everything right, they'll still be alive.
translation: 哇，我只求上帝保佑这奏效…打开这筒子，如果我都做对了，他们还会活着。

original: All right squad, listen up. I know you have no idea what's going on, but you'll just have to trust me.
translation: 好了，伙计们，听好了。我知道你们不明白是怎么回事，但你们只需要相信我。

original: We were captured by the aliens... the things that grabbed us from Anchorage and now we're free.
translation: 我们成了外星人的俘虏…从我们在安克雷奇被俘开始，而现在我们自由了 。

original: Here, take these weapons and follow me. Let's show them what some motivated U.S. soldiers can do!
translation: 给，拿上这些武器跟着我。让它们瞧瞧美国大兵的厉害！

original: On me, squad! Let's go!
translation: 跟着我，伙计们。我们上。

original: Okay.  Lets put these guys to use.
translation: 好的。让我们带着这些伙计。

original: They hit something big! Shields and Elliott are down!
translation: 它们打中了什么重要部件！护盾和艾略特关闭了！

original: They just took out our shields!
translation: 它们刚刚打穿了我们的护盾！

original: Think you can take care of that mess in the engine room?
translation: 你认为自己能料理引擎室里的杂碎吗？

original: Yeah, maybe your right.
translation: 是的，或许你是对的。

original: Listen, we're all in danger if we stay here.
translation: 听着，我们要是继续留在这里，我们都会有危险。

original: Oh, I know. They're always mad when they find out I've been out of my cell. They're gonna be REALLY mad when they see what you did.
translation: 哦，我知道了，它们发现我逃出牢房时总会很生气的。但它们看见你的所作所为时真的要发疯了。

original: But it's okay. I'll go with you! I can show you around some. I've seen a whole bunch of this place already.
translation: 但没关系。我会跟着你的！我可以带你参观这里。我对这里了如指掌。

original: We need to go through the Steamworks to the big engine room. From there we can see all sorts of places. Come on, I'll help you get there.
translation: 我们需要穿过蒸汽管线区到达引擎室。途中我们可以看到各种场所。快来，我帮你到那里。

original: How did you do that?
translation: 你是怎么做到的？

original: There's wires and stuff inside the wall there. A while ago I learned which ones to put together to make the doors work.
translation: 墙里面有电线和其他的材料，我要把它们组装在一起让门工作。

original: There's all kinds of stuff in the walls, but I guess you're too big to see. But that's okay, I can get to it just fine.
translation: 那墙后面有各种各样的材料，但我猜你太胖了。不过没关系，我刚好能过去。

original: Come on, we need to get to the big engine room so I can show you the rest of this place. I can help you even more!
translation: 我们要去引擎室让你看看这艘飞船上其他的人，如果你需要其他帮助的话尽管找我！

original: Thanks, kid. We're getting out of here -- you want to come with us?
translation: 谢谢你，孩子。我们要离开了—你要跟着一起走么？

original: Sure! I love exploring, and it's been a while since I've been out and about.
translation: 当然！我热爱冒险，因次我一直在外面闯荡。

original: We'll have to be careful, because they'll be mad that we're out. But it's okay, I know how to get through the steamworks.
translation: 我们要小心，因为它们将疯狂地搜捕我们，别担心，我知道怎么通过蒸汽管线区。

original: We need to get to the big engine room, so I can show you the rest of the ship. Let's go!
translation: 我们要去引擎室，我可以让你看看这艘飞船上其他的人，走吧。

original: I'll take over from here.
translation: 我会接管这里的！

original: Oh really? Suddenly you have all the answers?
translation: 哦，真的？你一下子都知道了？

original: Listen kid, I'm all ears if you've got an idea, but there's no way you've got any more idea what's going on here than I do.
translation: 听着孩子，如果你有好主意。我会洗耳恭听的，但是现在没有办法比我的办法更好了。

original: Do you have any idea where we are, or how to get back home?
translation: 你知道我们在哪，或者我们该怎么回家吗？

original: Not a clue. I'm hoping we can get some answers once we get out of this place.
translation: 谁知道，我希望我们离开这里时能得到一些答案。

original: You're the one with the plan.
translation: 你是个有计划的人。

original: Plan? Yeah, we just used my plan. It got us out of our cell.
translation: 计划？是的，就采用我的计划。我们要逃出牢房。

original: Hate to break it to you, but that's all I've got. We have to wing it from here.
translation: 你不愿意这样，但那是我必须做的。我们得从这里逃走。

original: No sense discussin’ it now.
translation: 现在没什么好争论的。

original: I don’t know, but maybe we should... there must be something...
translation: 我不知道，但也许我们应该…做些什么…

original: And how are we supposed to do that? We can’t understand what the hell they’re saying!
translation: 那我们应该怎么做呢？我们不知道它们在说些什么！

original: He’s not going anywhere. Why don’t we just hold on to him, and try to negotiate? Y’know, like a hostage?
translation: 他哪也没去。为什么我们不再耐心点对待他，并试着和他沟通？你觉得像一个累赘？

original: Why are we stuck inside the laboratory?
translation: 我们为什么会被困在实验室里？

original: I think when we opened the door to the operating room we set off some kind of containment alarm.
translation: 当我们打开手术室的门，可能触发了某种警报。

original: The room seals itself up and it looks like it's being flooded with some sort of decontamination gases. Pretty high-tech stuff.
translation: 这个房间是封闭的，好象充满了某种净化气体。完美的高科技产品。

original: Unless I miss my guess, it will cycle itself and unlock the doors in a little bit. We'll just have to wait it out.
translation: 如果我猜的没错的话，它会自动开启大门。我们等等先。

original: Not sure. We'll just have to wait for the system to cycle.
translation: 不是很肯定。我们得等待系统运行。

original: How long until the laboratory unseals itself?
translation: 打开实验室需要多久？

original: Hmmm. Let me take some of this cryogenic compound back to the engine core. I might be able to make some use of it.
translation: 嗯。我会带一些冷冻化合物回工程中枢，它可能有用。

original: Wait just a second...
translation: 等一下…

original: I think I've decided what we should do.
translation: 我想我已经决定该怎么做了。

original: Thanks. I'm really not sure what's best for them. What did you decide?
translation: 谢谢。我真不知该怎么处置他。你们怎么想？

original: We should just leave them here. It's too late for them.
translation: 我们走吧，他们没救了。

original: Well, we have to do something! We can't just leave them in there like some sort of a lab rat to get poked and prodded and cut open!
translation: 那么，我们要做点什么！我们至少不能让他们像实验室的小白鼠那样任人宰割！

original: We have to either let them fight and die like soldiers or at the very least put them out of their misery!
translation: 我们要么让他们像战士那样战死，或者至少可以解除他们的痛苦！

original: Do you know where we're going?
translation: 你知道我们要去哪里吗？

original: Sure!
translation: 当然！

original: We need to go to the big engine thing, and then from there we can go up to the top of the ship.
translation: 我们需要到引擎室，从那里我们可以到飞船的顶部。

original: That's where the guy in charge is. I've only seen him once or twice, but he's extra mean.
translation: 这是那家伙掌控的地方，我只见过它一两次，它很卑鄙。

original: I guess you'll probably have to kill him or something, huh?
translation: 我想你可能要杀了它，对吗?

original: Try hitting some buttons, one of them has to do something.
translation: 试着按下那堆按钮，总有一个是有用的。

original: Try hitting that button down there.  It's flashing, it probably does something good.
translation: 试着按那个按钮。它在闪，也许能派上些用场。

original: I've seen them use those arch things to heal themselves. I don't know if it'll work for you, but you could try it.
translation: 我看过它们用这些拱型医疗站治疗。不知道它对你是否有用，你可以试试看。

original: Those are some of their guns over there. You should get one. Or even a bunch of them, just in case.
translation: 这是它们的枪，你应该拿一把，或者多拿几把。以防万一。

original: There's some alien goo tubes on that table over there.  I've seen them use it to fix guns and stuff. I bet it'll work for you too.
translation: 那边桌子上有些外星凝胶管，我见过它们用它来修理武器等东西。我相信它也能为你所用。

original: Nice one!
translation: 漂亮！

original: Good job!
translation: 干得好！

original: Wow, you must really hate them.
translation: 哇，你肯定恨死它们了。

original: Over this way!
translation: 对面！

original: Yay! We made it. That wasn't so bad, was it?
translation: 耶！我们成功了。还不错，对吧？

original: You know, I could have done that for you. I'm only trying to help!
translation: 你知道吗，我能为你做到的。我只是想帮忙！

original: Or don't.
translation: 或者别这样。

original: Fine, be that way.
translation: 好的，就那样。

original: I'm just trying to make your life easier, but whatever.
translation: 我只想让你轻松点，但还是算了吧。

original: No, your other left!
translation: 不，你的另一边！

original: I'll stay up here to draw a bead on the aliens as they rush us. If they get near those towers... hit the buttons and fry 'em!
translation: 我会留在这，等它们突袭我们的时候就用电圈对付这群外星人。如果它们靠近那些电塔…就敲这按钮，震飞它们。

original: I dunno what that sound is, but it can't be good. Watch yourself, I think we're about to have company.
translation: 我不知道那声音是什么，但肯定没好事。你自己小心，我想咱们就要有伴儿了。

original: Finally. Let's get rid of that machine and then get the hell outta here.
translation: 最后，让我们毁掉那个机器，离开这个鬼地方。

original: Hold on there... don't take another step. No telling how far down that goes.
translation: 待在那里…别轻举妄动。还没说接下来怎么办呢。

original: Well, I thought I've seen it all... what the hell is that thing?
translation: 好吧，我想我都看到了…那到底是什么玩意？

original: Watch out! The damn things are comin' from the generator room!
translation: 小心！这该死的东西从发电机房跑出来的！

original: Scratch one generator machine. That oughta piss those aliens off! If we're done here, we should get back to the others.
translation: 弄毁了一台发电机，这会气死那些外星人的！我们要是干完了，就该回去和其他人会合了。

original: I had no choice... I.. I had to do it. You saw. They would have killed us. Damn it!
translation: 我别无选择…我…我必须这么干。你看到了。他们会杀了我们的。该死的！

original: Why couldn't you just wait before you opened their pods? If you don't trust me enough to listen to me, why did you drag me down here with you?
translation: 你为什么不能等到打开他们吊舱的时候呢？如果你不听我的，为什么还把我拖过来。

original: Ah forget it. It's too late now. They're dead and there's no way to bring them back. Let's get the hell out of here.
translation: 啊，算了。现在太迟了。他们已经死了，无法再挽救了。让我们离开这鬼地方。

original: What the hell did you do that for? There might have been a chance to save them! What the fuck is wrong with you?!
translation: 你到底做了什么？本来可以救活他们的！你他妈的搞什么？！

original: If you don't trust me enough to listen to me, why did you drag me down here with you?
translation: 如果你不听我的，为什么还把我拖过来?

original: Ah forget it. It's too late now. They're dead and there's no way to bring them back. Let's get the hell out of here.
translation: 啊，算了。现在太迟了。他们已经死了，无法再挽救了。让我们离开这鬼地方。

original: What the hell did you do that for? I thought we agreed to leave them alone!
translation: 你为什么要这样做？我想我们已经同意离开他们了！

original: What if we would have found some way to revive them safely and returned here? Then they may have had a chance!
translation: 如果我们能找到办法救活他们，让他们回到这？他们本来有机会的！

original: Ah forget it. It's too late now. They're dead and there's no way to bring them back. Let's get the hell out of here.
translation: 啊，算了。现在太迟了。他们已经死了，无法再挽救了。让我们离开这鬼地方。

original: Go away, meanie! Just you wait 'till my friend gets here!
translation: 走开，混蛋！我朋友来了的话，会给你好看！

original: Hey, we're moving... Cool!
translation: 嗨，我们正在移动…酷！

original: Aliens! Look out!
translation: 外星人！小心！

original: Cows? We got cows!
translation: 牛？我们看到了牛了！

original: Do you think you can make use of that stuff you picked up in the Cryo Labs?
translation: 你认为你从低温实验室里面搞回来的这些东西有用吗？

original: Yeah, I think so. Before I was shipped out to Anchorage, I was trained in cryoscience. We were hoping to apply that to medicine.
translation: 是的，我想是的。在来到安克雷奇前，我进行了新兵训练。我们希望成为一名医疗兵。

original: The compounds we used weren't that different from this cryogenic liquid. I'm pretty sure I can make us some improvised weapons from it.
translation: 我们使用的化合物与这低温液体差不多，我确信能用它改进武器。

original: I'm thinking something along the lines of cryo grenades and cryo mines... I don't know yet.
translation: 我在想冷冻手榴弹和冷冻地雷的联系…我还不太清楚。

original: Check back with me in about an hour and I'll see what I can do.
translation: 过一小时再来找我，看看我能做出什么。

original: Yeah, sure did. I was able to make a few cryo grenades and cryo mines.
translation: 是的，当然了。我能制造一些冰冻手榴弹或冰冻地雷。

original: I can make more, but I'll need around three more hours. Keep checking back with me and I'll tinker with it.
translation: 我能做更多，但我需要大约三小时。时不时回来看看。

original: Were you able to come up with any cryogenic weapons?
translation: 你能搞到一些冷冻武器吗？

original: Here you go. Hope you're making good use of them. If you need more, I should have a batch ready in about three hours.
translation: 给你，希望你好好利用。如果你要更多，我需要大约三小时。

original: Any more Cryo Grenades or Cryo Mines ready?
translation: 还有更多的冷冻手榴弹或者冷冻地雷吗？

original: Not yet. Still working on them.
translation: 还没完成，我正在做。

original: Any Cryo Grenades or Cryo Mines ready?
translation: 还有更多的冷冻手榴弹或者冷冻地雷吗？

original: We need to find out what that was, and put a stop to it.
translation: 我们得弄明白那是什么，然后阻止它。

original: I suppose. Lead the way.
translation: 我想可以，带路吧。

original: Yeah, no kidding. Wow, they've gotta be really pissed at us.
translation: 好了，别开玩笑了。哇，它们现在一定被咱们气疯了。

original: We better hurry up and find out how to shut that thing down.
translation: 我们最好赶快找到怎样关掉那东西。

original: Yeah, sure. No question about that.
translation: 是的，当然，没问题。

original: But if you ask me, seeing that was kind of good news. Means we're making some headway, you know? Really getting under their skin.
translation: 但是如果你问我，那看起来是个好消息。我们取得了一些成绩，明白吗？让它们受了重创。

original: I have no idea what he said, but he sounded pretty angry.
translation: 我听不懂它说的话，不过听起来它很不爽。

original: Yep, it seemed all riled up.
translation: 没错，它被激怒了。

original: Might end up being a good thing. Lose your cool, you're more likely to make mistakes.
translation: 可能是一件好事。失去冷静，更有可能犯错。

original: Still, seems we oughta make sure that doesn't happen again. Shut off whatever that thing was.
translation: 但是，看起来我们应该确保不会再发生此事。不管那是什么一定要关掉它。

original: You think? What clued you in?
translation: 你认为呢？有什么线索？

original: It's bad enough that they're trying to kill us, but that was... What, like trying to fry the Earth or something?
translation: 它们正追杀我们就够糟糕的了，没想到它们还要…什么？！它们还要把整个地球给油炸了？

original: We gotta find that... Death Ray, or whatever it is... and stop it!
translation: 我们必须找到那个…死光，不管它是什么…阻止它！

original: Oh, come on. You don't need to understand it to get the point.
translation: 哦，来吧，你不需要那么深入地了解它。

original: It's some kind of a threat. And if they're threatening us, it's a good bet we're starting to scare 'em a bit.
translation: 它是一种威胁。如果它们正在威胁着我们，去吓它们一下，这或许是个好主意。

original: Now, you ask me, we need to find out what that was and make sure it doesn't happen again, but at least we know we're getting somewhere.
translation: 现在，既然你问我，我们需要找出到底是怎么一回事并确保它不再发生。至少我们还知道我们现在该干什么。

original: What the hell was that?
translation: 发生了什么？

original: No idea. Been in over my head for a while now. Still, I'm thinking whatever that was, it wasn't a good thing.
translation: 还不知道，我想了一段时间。不过，我在想不管它是什么，应该不是什么好东西。

original: Probably best if it doesn't happen again, you get my meaning?
translation: 最好别再发生了，你懂我的意思吗？

original: How the hell do I know? It sure looked like it!
translation: 我他妈怎样知道？它看起来就像那样。

original: That was crazy! What if they use that thing on us!
translation: 这太疯狂了！如果它们用这东西对付我们怎么办！

original: You gotta find that thing. You gotta find it and get rid of it, before something really bad happens...
translation: 你得找到那个东西。在糟糕的事情发生前，你得找到并关掉它。

original: You think it was some sort of weapon?
translation: 你觉得这是某种武器吗？

original: Pretty obvious, wasn't it? They're putting on a big show, trying to scare us.
translation: 很明显，不是吗？它们要来次大型表演，想恐吓我们。

original: Means we're getting under their skin. That's a good thing.
translation: 好像我们就在它们的眼皮底下。这似乎不错。

original: Of course, now it looks like we've got a big Death Ray thing we need to take down before they blow up the whole damn planet.
translation: 当然，现在看上去有个死光等着我们去摧毁它，不然它们会炸了下面这颗倒霉星球的。

original: But it's nice to know we're having an effect, don't you think?
translation: 看起来我们所做的有点效果，你不觉得？

original: Are you all alone? Where's your family?
translation: 只有你一个人吗？你的家人在哪？

original: I don't have any family anymore.
translation: 我没有其他家人了。

original: My mom and dad died a while ago, before I ended up here. Y'know, back when all the bombs dropped on everything?
translation: 我的妈妈和爸爸在我被关在这之前就已经去世了。就在核弹把一切毁灭之前，你明白了吧？

original: Yeah, it was right after that. And then me and my sister, we got pulled up here... Except I haven't seen her in a long time.
translation: 然后我和我姐姐，我们被带到了这儿…我已经很久没看到她了。

original: How do you know so much about this place?
translation: 你怎么会对这个地方如此了解？

original: Oh, I've been here a while. A long while.
translation: 噢，我已经在这待了一段时间了。一段很长的时间。

original: Sometimes I can sneak out of my cell and go explore. I've seen a bunch of the ship. It's pretty neat, but they always catch me and put me back here.
translation: 有时候我可以偷偷离开了我的牢房去探险。我曾经瞧见过一大群这样的船。这实在是太美了，可它们总是抓住我，把我扔回这里。

original: I found this sword... does it belong to you?
translation: 我找到这柄剑，是你的么？

original: Oh, sessha no ken! Katajike nai.
translation: 哦，在下的剑！万分感激。

original: Sumanuga, korekara dosuruka hitoride kangaetai. Shitsurei suru.
translation: 抱歉，在下想独自细想今后的打算。失礼了。

original: Yeah, I'm not getting a single word here.
translation: 耶，我一个字都听不懂。

original: Nantoka senuka! Sessha no ken wa ittai doko ni arunoda!
translation: 做点什么！在下的剑究竟在何处？

original: I'm sorry, but I can't understand you.
translation: 很抱歉，但是我听不懂你说的话。

original: Nani wo itteorunoda. Sappari wakaran. Nantoka shite kure.
translation: 发生了何事，全然不明。做点什么。

original: Oh, great. You don't speak English? This is going to be a waste of time.
translation: 哦，太他妈好了。你不会讲英语？这真是浪费时间。

original: Onushi, ittai nanimono? Sessha wa naze koko ni iru?
translation: 阁下究竟乃何人？在下为何在此？

original: Sessha no ken wa do natta. Eei, hayaku kaesanu ka!
translation: 在下的剑怎么了。诶，速速还回！

original: Calm down. We're trying to escape. Can you help us?
translation: 冷静点。我们在试着逃跑。你能帮帮我们么？

original: Nani wo itte orunoda. Kono chi ni mioboe wa nai. Ittai sessha ni nani wo shita?
translation: 发生了何事，全无印象。究竟对在下做了什么？

original: Sessha no ken wo imasugu kaesunoda. Hayaku kaesanu ka!
translation: 立即还回在下的剑来。速速还回！

original: What? What are you saying?
translation: 什么？你在说什么？

original: Sessha no ken wa dokoda? Ima sugu kaesanu ka!
translation: 在下的剑在何处？速速还回！

original: Hey, are you okay?
translation: 嗨，你还好吗？

original: Sappari wakaran. Koko ga doko nanoka mouse. Sessha no ken wa do shita?
translation: 全然不明。快说此处为何处。在下的剑怎么了？

original: What do you know about this Toshiro Kago guy?
translation: 你知道什么有关加护俊这家伙的事吗？

original: Uhh... it wasn't my turn to watch him?
translation: 呃…不是还没轮到我看着他吗？

original: I dunno. He was here before...
translation: 我不知道。他之前还在这的……

original: Where's that Kago guy?
translation: 加护那家伙在哪？

original: He looks like a Japanese Samurai. I guess the aliens must have plucked him up from earth a long time ago. I can't understand a word he's saying.
translation: 他看来像个日本武士。我猜外星人一定在很久以前就把他带离地球了。我 完全听不懂他说的。

original: Huh, how about that. He's gone. I didn't even notice.
translation: 呃，那怎么办。他都走了。我却一直没察觉。

original: Hope he doesn't get himself into trouble.
translation: 希望他别给他自己惹上麻烦。

original: I don't see that Kago fellow.
translation: 我没看见那个加护跟过来。

original: No idea what his deal is. Sounds like that gibberish you can pick up on the radio in some parts of the Wasteland.
translation: 不知道他在说什么。听起来就好象在废墟上的一些电台。

original: Took off. Don't know where to. Don't much care.
translation: 出发。不知道到哪去了。不过没什么好担心的。

original: Where's that Kago guy?
translation: 加护那家伙在哪？

original: Some sort of foreigner, obviously. Can't make out a word he's saying.
translation: 很明显是个外国人。他的话一句都没法听明白。

original: Ummm, I think he's from the earth's past. There are people frozen all over the ship that the aliens grabbed wearing funny old time clothes and stuff.
translation: 嗯，我想他来自古代。船上到处都是被外人星人抓来冷冻的穿着有趣的古装和饰品的人。

original: I'll handle this.
translation: 我能搞定。

original: But I can help!
translation: 但是我能帮上忙！

original: Don't worry about it.
translation: 没关系。

original: Oookay...
translation: 好吧…

original: Well good luck. I'm going to get out of sight. Don't worry, I'll stay nearby and help you when I can.
translation: 真幸运。我会躲起来的，别担心，我会在附近尽可能帮你的。

original: How about I distract them, and you hit them from behind with a grenade?
translation: 我吸引它们的主意，而你从背后用手榴弹袭击它们，你看这个主意怎么样？

original: Wow, really?
translation: 哇，真的？

original: I get to use a grenade? Neat!
translation: 我会用手榴弹？太棒了！

original: Take this Plasma Grenade.
translation: 拿着这个等离子手榴弹。

original: Got it! Give me a minute to sneak around them.
translation: 了解！给我点时间偷偷绕到它们后面。

original: Take this Frag Grenade.
translation: 拿着这个烟雾手榴弹。

original: Cool!
translation: 酷！

original: Give me just a second to get behind them...
translation: 给我点时间偷偷绕到它们后面…

original: You sure this is a good idea?
translation: 你确定这是个好主意？

original: I think so. Seems like they're getting even more angry at us.
translation: 我想是的。它们看起来更生气了。

original: Forget the teleporter. Let's just go.
translation: 忘了传送装置吧，我们用走的。

original: That doesn't seem like a very good idea.
translation: 这似乎不是一个好主意。

original: If they turned it off, that means they know we're here, and they're probably waiting on the other side of that door.
translation: 如果它们关掉它，那说明它们知道了我们在这，它们也许会在门后偷袭我们 。

original: It'd be smarter if just one person went and checked it out.
translation: 只让一个人去查看会比较明智。

original: Don't worry, we'll be safe right here. Good luck!
translation: 别担心，我们在这里很安全。好运！

original: Okay, you wait here. I'll see if I can find the controls.
translation: 好吧，我们在这里等。我会试着找出控制开关的方法。

original: Good luck! We'll stay right here and wait for you.
translation: 祝你好运！我们会待在这等你。

original: What did you get us into this time?
translation: 你这次又把我们弄到哪里了？

original: I think we're in the trash section of the ship. Yucky!
translation: 我想我们是在船上的废品站。真讨厌！

original: Let's go back the way we came.
translation: 我们原路返回。

original: You really must have hit your head. Unless you're Captain Cosmos and have a rocket pack we can use, that's not happening.
translation: 你脑子坏掉了吗？除非你是背着火箭背包的考斯莫思舰长，但那是不可能的。

original: I'm all right. How about you?
translation: 我很好。你呢？

original: I think I'm okay. You don't look so good, though.
translation: 我想我没事。不过你看上去不太好。

original: I'm fine. No thanks to you.
translation: 我很好。不谢了。

original: I'm sorry, okay!? How was I supposed to know this would happen?
translation: 我很抱歉，好吗！？我怎么可能预料到会变成这样？

original: Let's get back to the core.
translation: 我们回中枢去。

original: Sure, there's a teleporter nearby that I found. Race ya!
translation: 我发现附近有个传送装置，跑！

original: Okay, I'll try and find a way to help you get out of there. Otherwise, see you back at the core.
translation: 好，我会尽力救你出去，你先回中枢看看。

original: I guess we should split up.
translation: 我想我们应该分头行动。

original: Thanks for nothing, Sally.
translation: 没什么好谢的，莎莉。

original: Hey, it's not like this was a wasted trip. Check out the storage closet I found here.
translation: 嗨，这不是一次空手而归的旅行，瞧瞧我在这里找到储藏柜。

original: Well, that was... fun.  What now?
translation: 呃，那可真……有趣。现在干嘛？

original: Let's get back to the core and never speak of this again.
translation: 我们回中枢吧，别再谈这个了。

original: Do you think we were noticed?
translation: 你觉得我们被发现了吗？

original: Oh, I get it! We're in one of their trash cans that move around the ship. I always wondered where these things go...
translation: 哦，我知道了！我们在一个环绕飞船旋转的垃圾桶里，我想知道接着会发生什么…

original: [BANGING SOUND COMING FROM BRIDGE DOOR]
translation: [舰桥上传来的砰砰声]

original: Wait, did anyone hear that?
translation: 等等，有人听到吗？

original: Wait, did you hear that?
translation: 等等，你听到了吗？

original: Little busy here, darling.
translation: 有点忙，亲爱的。

original: What did you hear, Sally?
translation: 你听到什么了，莎莉？

original: [BANGING SOUND COMING FROM BRIDGE DOOR]
translation: [舰桥上传来的砰砰声]

original: There it is again. Is that an Alien?
translation: 又来了。是外星人？

original: Iretekure! Sessha wa eirian deha gozaran. Sessha wa samurai nari. Otanomi mosu!
translation: 请让在下进去！在下并非外星人。在下乃武士是也。拜托了！

original: Oh, it's the Samurai! We should let him in!
translation: 噢，是那个武士！我们应该让他进来！

original: Fine. Let the Chinaman in. Could use his arm in here if it gets rough.
translation: 好吧，让中国朋友加入。如果事态变糟，他还能帮帮忙。

original: Actually, I think he's from Japan.
translation: 实际上，我觉得他是个日本人。

original: As you say. Kindly invite the Oriental gentleman with the sword to join us... NOW!
translation: 像你说的，礼貌地邀请那个带着剑的东方绅士加入我们…就是现在！

original: Hello Samurai! Glad you're still alive.
translation: 你好，武士！很高兴你还活着。

original: Ya, kore wa katajike nai. Soregashi ni dekiru kotoga gozareba nannarito.
translation: 呀，真是万分感激。凡在下力所能及之事，请尽管吩咐。

original: You think anything in here can prove useful?
translation: 你认为这里有什么东西用得上？

original: Well, the cryogenics compound I found will help already, but keep your eyes open for anything else.
translation: 很好，我找到的低温化合物会有帮助的，再留意你的周围找找其他东西。

original: I'm not sure. Some of this stuff looks way more advanced than anything I've ever seen.
translation: 我不确定。有些东西比我见过的任何人造产品都要先进。

original: Let's keep an eye out for any kind of materials or equipment I might be able to adapt for humans.
translation: 留意任何材料或者装置，我也许会让它们为人类所用。

original: Well, if this is where they make the robots, we may be able to discover some way to weaken or control them.
translation: 那么，如果这里就是它们制造机器人的地方，我们可以想办法削弱或控制它们。

original: Be on the lookout for any gizmos or schematics.
translation: 找找机械装置或图纸。

original: The only thing useful in here is me and my gun. Now let's keep moving.
translation: 在这里唯一管用的就是我和我的枪，现在继续赶路吧。

original: Epoxy over here.
translation: 这有环氧树脂。

original: All right, some epoxy!
translation: 太好了，一些环氧树脂！

original: Grab some of that epoxy, our weapons could use the field repair.
translation: 拿上环氧树脂，我们的武器可以用这东西来进行临时维修。

original: More gas.
translation: 更多的瓦斯。

original: Check your weapon, they're venting in gas again.
translation: 准备好你的武器，他们又往里面放瓦斯了。

original: They're trying to gas us again.
translation: 它们又想试着熏死我们了。

original: Holy hell.
translation: 见鬼。

original: I wonder what a well placed grenade could do to that thing.
translation: 我想瞧瞧一颗在合适位置的手榴弹能对那玩意造成什么影响。

original: What is that thing?
translation: 那是什么东西？

original: Gas.  Flammable gas.
translation: 瓦斯。可燃气体。

original: Smells like they're pumping in flammable gas.
translation: 闻起来似乎他们正往里面灌可燃性气体。

original: They're flooding the room with gas.
translation: 它们想用瓦斯灌满这房间。

original: What a mess.
translation: 一塌糊涂。

original: Welcome to the bowels of this shit hole.
translation: 欢迎进到这个狗屎洞。

original: This place is filthy.
translation: 这地方真恶心。

original: What's going on in there?
translation: 那是怎么回事？

original: Looks like they're repairing something in there.
translation: 看上去它们在那修理什么。

original: Those guys in there look busy.
translation: 那些家伙看上去很忙。

original: Great. No way to open this that I can see. What do we do now?
translation: 好极了，我看我们没办法打开这个。现在该怎么办？

original: Hey! Hey, you okay? You all right?
translation: 嗨！嗨，你怎么样了？还好吧？

original: Well, isn't this fancy, all these shiny machines and such. Gotta find a generator, huh? Let's see... How about we start with that teleporter thing?
translation: 恩，这不是很眩吗，这些亮晶晶的机器。得找个发电机出来，对吧？让我们瞧瞧…我们从那个传送装置开始怎么样？

original: Hell, my horse never did that...
translation: 真见鬼，我的马从来不那样…

original: Our situation didn't get any better by the looks of what happened here. I say we get the hell out of here.
translation: 这里发生的事并没改善我们的处境。要我说，我们该离开这鬼地方了。

original: Curious, but I don't think I want to know the answer judging by what happened here. Let's not stay long, this place gives me the creeps.
translation: 有点好奇，但关于这里发生了什么来看，我不想知道答案。我们别待太久了，这地方让我毛骨悚然。

original: What kind of horses are these anyway? I can't see anyone havin' any respect ridin' into town on one of those things.
translation: 无论如何，这是哪种马？我没见过小镇中有这样的马。

original: What are they doing to the Buttercups?
translation: 它们要这小马巴特卡普干嘛？

original: Oh OK, now it all makes sense...
translation: 好吧，现在这都说的通了…

original: Why look at what we got here.  Little girl here ridin' one of those horses.  Giddyup Buttercup...kind of catchy ain't it?
translation: 看看我们为什么来这，小女孩要来这骑马。小马巴特卡普…它挺吸引人的，不是吗？

original: Oh wow. I remember these posters plastered all over the place back home.
translation: 哇。我记得老家那里到处都贴着这样的海报。

original: They even have some of the posters I've seen scattered about the Wastes. Looks like they're studying them...or idolizing them, not sure.
translation: 它们甚至有那些我在废土上见过的海报，看来它们正在学习…或者崇拜它们，我不确定。

original: Giddyup.
translation: 驾。

original: This is kind of disturbing.
translation: 令人不安。

original: OK, this is getting a little ridiculous now.
translation: 有点意思。

original: Well I'll be damned...look at all 'em!
translation: 好吧，我会被诅咒的… 看看它们！

original: Look, even more of them.  Buttercups that is.
translation: 看啊，还有更多。小马巴特卡普。

original: Huh, I wonder what they're doing with them.
translation: 我想知道它们正在对他做什么。

original: Hey look, Giddyup Buttercups! All the rich kids had them.  Waste of money if you ask me.
translation: 嗨，看啊，小马巴特卡普！有钱的孩子都有。但要我说那就是浪费钱。

original: You've got to be kidding me... I saw posters like these all over the ruins.  Never actually saw one 'til now.
translation: 你一定是在开玩笑…我在废墟中见过类似所有这些一样的海报。但直到现在从没见过一个这样的。

original: Now that looks like some tough ridin'. Those things real?
translation: 现在那看起来有些不好骑的样子。那些东西是真的吗？

original: Oh! I see! Like a tape recorder, right? You just want me to talk? I can do that, certainly.
translation: 哦！我懂了！这就像一个录音机，对不对？你只是想让我聊聊？我会做的，没问题。

original: Hello there! I'm Madeline Wallace. Of the Cincinatti Wallaces?
translation: 你好！我是玛德琳·华莱士。所属辛辛那提的华莱士队？

original: Well, I... I'm here, on this rocket ship. I'm with the strange men, the space men. The ones who brought me here.
translation: 是的，我在这…在这个火箭船上。我和一些陌生的太空人在一起。是它们把我带到这里的。

original: My entire family is onboard, actually. My husband, Roy, daughter Margaret, and my son Arthur, as well.
translation: 实际上，我的家人都在飞船上。我的丈夫罗伊，女儿玛格丽特和儿子亚瑟。

original: Oh, you should see Arthur! He's so excited. He says this is much better than the things they show on Captain Cosmos.
translation: 哦，你应该见见亚瑟！他很兴奋。他说这比《考斯莫思舰长》里演的要好多了。

original: And I have to say - I agree! Everything is just so... fantastical! I can only hope our hosts have been talking with Uncle Sam.
translation: 我得说—我同意！一切都是…棒极了！我只希望这里的主人和美国谈过了。

original: Because with these doohickeys, we'd have the Reds beat in no time! He he he he.
translation: 因为只要有了这些技巧，我们很快就能修理赤匪了！呵呵。

original: Hmmm? I'm terribly sorry, sir. I'm doing my best. I really don't know what you want me to say.
translation: 呃？非常抱歉，先生。我尽力了。我真不知道您想让我说些什么。

original: Whomever will listen to this recording, I would just like to state that if you find yourself in the same boat as the Wallaces, don't be afraid.
translation: 任何人都可能听到这段录音，如果你发现自己和华莱士处境相同，别害怕。

original: I'm not entirely sure what our hosts want, but the situation has been entirely acceptable. We have been treated fairly.
translation: 我不确定这里的主人在想什么，但情形还不错，我们得到了公正的对待。

original: Anyway, the space man is waving his little electrical stick thingy, so I think I'm done. Goodbye!
translation: 无论怎样，太空人开始挥舞他的小电棒了，我想我已经说完了。再见！

original: Yes, yes, I understand! I've seen the others. I'll do what you want.
translation: 是的，是的，我明白！我见过其他人了。我会照你说的办。

original: This is Doctor Morrison Rand, Professor of Anthropological Archaeology at Banfield College, Humboldt, Orgeon.
translation: 这是莫莉森·兰德博士，俄勒冈州洪堡班菲尔德学院的人类考古学教授。

original: Shortly after 10:00 p.m., on August 16, 2041, as I was leaving the college campus, headed to my car, I saw a blinding light.
translation: 10年00月16日下午2041时后，就在我离开大学校园，走向我的汽车的时候，我看到了一道耀眼的光芒。

original: It just... appeared. In the sky, directly over me. I was blinded. I also found my body completely immobilized. I couldn't move, not at all.
translation: 它…出现了。在天上，直对着我。我看不见了。我还发现我的身体被完全固定了。一动都不能动。

original: What happened next is... hazy. I don't remember much. But what became clear later - what is certainly clear now - is that I was abducted.
translation: 后来发生的事很…朦胧。我记不太清。但我后来明白了一些事—现在则彻底明白了—我被绑架了。

original: I am now the captive of an alien race, one of many people held here, against our will. And, like those others, I am recording who I am.
translation: 我现在是外星人的俘虏，被强行囚禁在这的人中的一员。和其他人一样，我正在记录着我是谁。

original: Why? Because the aliens want us to, for some reason. They have us do it right before they put us into some kind of... suspended animation.
translation: 为什么？因为出于某种原因，外星人要我们这样做。它们要让我们进入了一种…假死状态。

original: These recordings... It's almost as if we're creating our own library catalog entries, before we get put into a giant collection.
translation: 这些录音…这就相当于我们正在创建我们自己的资料库索引条目，在当我们被放置进一个巨大的收集库之前。

original: The entire experience would be fascinating if I weren't so completely terrified.
translation: 如果我不是被吓坏了，这个经历将会是多么令人着迷。

original: What? Stop? You want me to stop now. All right! All right, see? I'm stopping...
translation: 什么？停止？你要我现在停止。好吧！好吧，明白了，我已经停止了…

original: What? What the fuck is this thing? Ya got some kind of Martian sex machine, you sick fuck? Uh uh. No way.
translation: 什么？这他妈是什么？他们的一个火星性玩具？没门。

original: Ahh! God DAMNIT! Fuckin' crazy-ass Moon Man! Go ahead! Do your worst!
translation: 啊！见鬼！欠操的月球疯子！来啊！放马过来啊！

original: Gaaaaahh!! Jesus H! Do you not get it, space cadet? I. Do. Not. Fucking. Understand. What. You. Want. Me. To. Do!
translation: 噶啊~~~！！操！太空变态，你还不明白？我！他！妈！的！不！懂！你！要！干！嘛！

original: This thing? This? What? Talk? I AM talking! What do you want me to say?!
translation: 这东西？这？什么？说话？我这不就在说！你要我说什么？！

original: Blah blah blah, yakkety yakkety! That all you assholes can say?! Space men with all this science, and you can't even speak fuckin' English?
translation: 巴啦巴啦巴啦，丫壳提丫壳提！你这白痴就会这两句啊？！又是太空人又是外星科技，怎么他妈的连句英文都不会说啊？

original: Okay, how's about this. My name is Vin. I am on a fucking UFO. I'm from Flatbush, and I want to get home. Can I get a taxi, please?
translation: 好了，这样如何。我叫维恩。我在一个该死的UFO上。我来自弗莱巴许，我要回家。劳驾，我可以叫出租车吗？

original: How's that? Huh? That work for ya, starstruck?
translation: 怎么样？呃？追星族，该满意了吧？

original: What? Don't you raise that fuckin' thing to me again... Oh, you gonna hit me again? Is that...
translation: 什么？别再拿那破玩意戳我…哦，你还要打我？那…

original: Agggghhhhh!! Sonofa... Why don't you go back to Uranus, huh? Ha ha ha <zap!> Agggh!
translation: 啊~~~！婊子养的…怎么不滚回天王星去，呃？哈哈哈 <电击声！> 啊~~！

original: What? Talk into this thing? Just... talk? I don't have to do anything else?
translation: 什么？谈谈？只是…谈？我不需要做什么其他的事？

original: Ow! All right! <Zap!> Ow! I said all right! Just stop!
translation: 嗷！好吧！<电击声！> 嗷！我说好吧！快停下！

original: Hello. Um... hello. My name is Andrew Endicott.
translation: 你好…我叫安德鲁·恩迪科特。

original: On the night of May 17th, the year our Lord 1697, I was... I was taken.  From my home in Salem Village.
translation: 在5月17日晚上，教历1697年，我被…带走了，从塞勒姆村的家里。

original: I... I do not know where I am, exactly, or why I came to be here.
translation: 我…我不知道我在哪里，还有为什么会来到这里。

original: I have seen, through... windows... the stars, and sun, and beloved Earth. Down there, below me.
translation: 透过…窗户…我看到星星、太阳和亲爱的地球。就在那里，在我脚下。

original: So it would seem I am aboard some vessel, suspended in the ether. Ironically, it would seem, so close to where I thought Heaven must surely lie.
translation: 我似乎是上了一艘悬浮在以太中的飞船。讽刺的是，这看似非常接近我曾认为是天堂的所在之处。

original: But this is not Heaven. And my captors are not angels. I am not entirely unconvinced that the scripture is wrong. That Heaven and Hell are reversed.
translation: 但这不是天堂，虏劫我的并非天使。我不是说信奉的圣经是错的，天堂与地狱已然颠倒。

original: For my captives are devils. Demons from my nightmares. Even now they watch me, make me talk.
translation: 虏劫我的人是魔鬼。来自我噩梦中的魔鬼。即使是现在它们还在盯着我，逼我开口。

original: They seem to want me to tell my story. I know not why. A record of their deeds, perhaps? Or am I just a pawn in some... some evil game.
translation: 它们似乎想知道我的故事。我不知道为什么。也许是为了它们的一项记录？或者我只是一只棋子…一只邪恶游戏中的棋子。

original: And there are others. Other... captives, I mean. From whence they came I cannot say.
translation: 还有其他一些。其他…我是说，俘虏。我不能确定他们来自何方。

original: Some wear strange dress, as if they are from... a different time. And some are... frozen! As in ice! Unmoving! But, I think... alive.
translation: 一些穿着怪异的服装，好像来自…不同的时代。一些是…被冻结的！在冰块里！一动不动！但是我觉得是…活的。

original: I believe they plan the same fate for me.  Will I be frozen, too?  Will I...
translation: 我相信它们也打算给予我同样的命运。我也会被冻起来？我将…

original: Ow! Stop it! I did what you said! You wanted me to talk, so I talked! Just leave me! Leave me be!
translation: 噢！住手！我照你说的做了！你要我说，我都说了！现在放过我！放过我吧！

original: This place is incredible. Can you imagine having stuff like this in the Wasteland? You'd even be a match for the Brotherhood of Steel.
translation: 这个地方真不可思议，你能相信废土上会有这样的东西？你都能和钢铁兄弟会媲美了。

original: Nothing we can do for this guy now...
translation: 我们现在不能为这家伙做什么了…。

original: Goddamn Raiders. Last thing I need up here is more of them.
translation: 该死的歹徒。我最后要做的就是干掉他们。

original: Oh, she's toast. Forget it, there's no one home.
translation: 哦，她已经死了。忘了吧，没有家了。

original: Come on, this is a waste of our time.
translation: 赶快，这真浪费时间。

original: Okay, you're doing good! Just keep going.
translation: 很好，干得很好！继续。

original: We'll be at the engineering core in no time!
translation: 我们要赶快到工程中枢！

original: All righty. Here's how it's gonna go down. You point, I shoot, aliens die. All of the crazy gizmo stuff is up to you.
translation: 那好吧。继续这么干。你按钮，我开枪，外星佬死光光。所有疯狂的机械玩意都交给你了。

original: DLC05HQPaulsonGeneratorDone
translation: DLC05HQPaulsonGeneratorDone

original: Once that core gets exposed, blast it!
translation: 中枢一露出来就炸他个稀巴烂！

original: Woah... I've never seen anything like that in my life.
translation: 哇…我这辈子还从没见过像那样的东西。

original: There! That ought to give the aliens something to think about. Now let's get the hell out of here.
translation: 就该如此。这么一来应该能让那群外星杂碎长长记性。现在让我们离开这鬼地方。

original: That's got to be the generator. Let's destroy it and get back to the engine core.
translation: 这应该就是那台发电机了。让我们毁了它，然后回工程中枢。

original: Nuka what?
translation: 核子什么？

original: Thirsty? Heh, I wonder if the aliens love this stuff as much we do down below.
translation: 口渴了？嘿，我怀疑外星人和我们下面的人一样喜欢这东西。

original: Nuka-Cola! You know, they came out with this stuff called Nuka-Cola Quantum way back. Now that was some powerful stuff. I can still taste it now.
translation: 核子可乐！我知道，他们中途还推出过种叫做量子型核子可乐的玩意。那可是相当带劲的东西。我现在嘴里都还有它的味道。

original: I wouldn't go jumpin' down there if I were you.
translation: 要是我是你的话，是不会冒险下去的。

original: Now that's what I call a trash chute. I wouldn't get too close, don't wanna fall in or anything.
translation: 那就是被我称为垃圾瀑布的玩意。我可不想靠太近，免得掉下去或出别的什么事。

original: Well, that's one way to take out the garbage.
translation: 好吧，那就是条处理垃圾的通道。

original: Then you stand WAY back, because it gets really hot and goes 'kaboom'!
translation: 你得退后站得远远的，因为它会变得非常热，然后就“喀嘭”！

original: Then, you push down these other things here. See? The ones that keep it cool.
translation: 然后，你把其余的罐子推下去，看见了吗？这些罐子是用来冷却的。

original: First, you push the button to make the generator come up from the floor.
translation: 首先，你按下按钮，使发电机升到地面上。

original: I've seen the aliens use these a bunch of times, so I'm an expert.
translation: 我观察了很久外星人如何使用它们，我是专家。

original: Okay, here it is. Neat, huh?
translation: 好了，在这。对吗，是吧?

original: So what are these generators? How do they work?
translation: 这些发电机是怎么回事？它们怎么运作的？

original: Oh, you'll know them when you see them.
translation: 哦，当你看到它们你就了解了。

original: You push this button, and then this big thing is like WOOOSH and it comes out of the floor...
translation: 你按这个按钮，然后等这些大家伙“呼哧”一下窜出地面…

original: ...and then there are these things you press down and it goes SHHHHHHH and then you'd better get out of the way. You'll see.
translation: …然后你按下这个，它会变的…嘘~~~…你最好让开点。看着。

original: Okay, let's talk to the astronaut.
translation: 好吧，让我们跟那个太空人谈谈。

original: This is going to be so neat!
translation: 这会很整齐！

original: Why do we need a 'spaceman' to help us?
translation: 为什么我们需要一个“太空人”的帮忙？

original: Well, because he's got a spacesuit! Can't go out in space without one. And if we're going to escape, we need to go outside.
translation: 嗯，因为他有件宇航服！没有它就不能出去。如果我们要逃走，我们就需要出去。

original: If they turned off the elevator things, that's the only other way to go. So we need a suit. See? Simple!
translation: 如果它们关掉了电梯，这是仅存的出路。所以我们需要一套宇航服，明白了吧？很简单的道理！

original: Who are these people?
translation: 这些家伙是谁？

original: I don't know. I've never talked to them. Sometimes I'd come and look at them, and wonder why they're dressed like that.
translation: 我不知道。我从没跟它们谈过。有时我会来看看它们想知道为什么它们穿成那样。

original: You see that one guy? He has this really neat suit on... like armor or something!
translation: 你看到那家伙了？他穿着很整洁的衣服…类似于装甲什么的！

original: And that other guy? He looks just like a cowboy! I saw pictures of cowboys in books. I never saw a real one, though.
translation: 那个家伙呢？他看起来像个牛仔！我在书里看过牛仔。但是我从没看过真正的。

original: What are these things?
translation: 这些东西是什么？

original: I've seen these all over. They put people in them, and the people go to sleep. They stay asleep for a really long time, too.
translation: 我全都看见了。它们把人放进里面，然后这些人就睡着了。它们也会留下沉睡很久。

original: Be careful if you touch them, though. They're really cold.
translation: 如果你要碰它们，那就小心点。它们真的很凉。

original: How are you holding up?
translation: 你还撑得住吗？

original: Pretty good, I guess. This is scary, but it's also kind of fun.
translation: 我觉得很好。这有点吓人，但是会很有趣。

original: There's a teleporter to the bridge, but it doesn't work.
translation: 舰桥上有个传送装置，但是它坏了。

original: Yeah, I think they're trying to keep us from getting there.
translation: 是啊，我想它们正想办法阻止我们到达那里。

original: Well, we should look for another way to go. There's one more here that works...
translation: 好吧，我们应该另找一条路走，会更好些…

original: You go through first, and make sure it's safe, and I'll be right behind you, okay?
translation: 你先过去，确保安全，然后我会跟上你，好吗？

original: So we're here. Now what?
translation: 我们到了，接着怎么做？

original: Well, it looks like they're still keeping some of these turned off.
translation: 好吧，看起来它们还关着什么。

original: But there's one that's on, so I guess that's the way we go!
translation: 但那还有一个，所以我猜我们该走这边！

original: You should probably go through first, in case there's something bad on the other side. And then I can go through after. Okay?
translation: 你应该先过去，以防对面有什么。然后我再过去，好吗？

original: This has been a hell of a ride, hasn't it?
translation: 这真是一趟地狱旅程啊，对吧？

original: No offense, but this ain't some sort of game.
translation: 没有恶意，但这不是在玩游戏。

original: My whole life is over. Gone, a long time ago.
translation: 我的人生在很久以前就该终结了。

original: Sorry if I can't make light of the situation like you can.
translation: 抱歉，我不能像你一样乐天。

original: Yeah, that's one way of putting it. Not really something I'm interested in doing again.
translation: 是啊，这只说说而已，我没有兴趣再做一次。

original: Boy, I sure hope not. But at least we know what to do with them, right?
translation: 小伙子，我当然不希望。但至少我们知道该如何处理它们了，对吧?

original: You think they'll ever come back?
translation: 你觉得它们还会回来吗？

original: What will you do now?
translation: 现在你要干嘛？

original: I think I'm going to stay here for a while. I don't think I'd like it much down there anymore, and there's still a bunch of the ship I haven't seen.
translation: 我想我要暂时留在这里。我恐怕不会再习惯下面的世界，而这里还有很多地方我没探索过。

original: I'll tell you what. If I find anything really neat, I'll bring it to you, okay?
translation: 我告诉你，如果我发现任何好东西，我会拿来让你见识见识，好吗？

original: I don't know... I don't really have a place down there anymore, do I? Doesn't sound like it'd suit me very well.
translation: 我不知道…下面应该已经没有我的容身之地了，是吧？看起来那儿不太适合我。

original: I think I'll stick around here for a while. See if I can't figure out some of this technology.
translation: 我想我会待在这儿。看看我不能搞出这样的技术。

original: I'm gonna see about getting off this thing. Head back to the Wasteland with some new toys, maybe carve out a place for myself.
translation: 我要想想这事，把一些新玩意带回到废土，也许我该为自己开辟一片新天地。

original: Literally, if I have to.
translation: 确实，如果我必须那样。

original: Odds are we won't be bumping into each other again, so I just wanted to say thanks.
translation: 也许我们会分道扬镳了，所以我只想说声谢谢。

original: Thanks for your help. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation: 谢谢你的帮助。没有你，我们无法成功。

original: I know. And you're very welcome.
translation: 我知道，这真不算什么。

original: Aw, come on. We both know you could have.
translation: 过来，我们知道你行的。

original: That's right! If it weren't for me, you'd be sitting in a holding cell or lying on some crazy operating table right now.
translation: 好吧！如果不是我，你现在会待在留置间里或是躺在一些疯子的手术台上。

original: You owe me big time, kid.
translation: 你欠我很多，孩子。

original: I can't feel my legs... what did you do to my legs...
translation: 我的腿失去知觉了…你对我的腿做了什么…

original: ...Frank? I can't see you...
translation: …弗兰克？我看不见你…

original: <growling noises>
translation: <咆哮声>

original: Frank? Frank! What did they do to you?!
translation: 弗兰克？弗兰克！它们对你做了什么?！

original: Ahhhhhhhhhh!!
Oh god, what are you doing to me? What's that thing? Get it out of me!
translation: 天哪，你在对我做什么？那是什么东西？把它从我身上拿掉！

original: Ahhh.... that hurts... oh, please... stop... no.... <grunting>
translation: 啊…好痛…噢，拜托… 停下…不要…<惨叫声>

original: <growling noises>
translation: <咆哮声>

original: This is... this is incredible! I'm... I'm Colonel Hartigan, of the United States Air Force.
translation: 这是…真是难以置信！我…我是哈德根上校，隶属美国空军。

original: I'm sorry, what? I don't understa... Oh, speak into this? Yes, I was saying, I'm Colonel Hartigan, United States Air Force.
translation: 对不起，什么？我不清楚 …哦，对着这个说？是的，我是说，我是哈德根上校，隶属美国空军。

original: Our nation has been conducting manned spaceflight tests... I'm sorry, you'll have to forgive me. Frankly we never expect to meet you all!
translation: 我们国家一直在进行载人航天测试…对不起，你得原谅我。坦白的说，我们从来没指望过会遇上你们！

original: I'm sure there's a great deal that our two species can learn from <zap>
translation: 我敢肯定我们两个种族一定会学到很多<电击声>

original: Oww! What the Hell? What is this, what are you doing?
translation: 噢！怎么回事？这是什么，你在干什么？

original: Nanda kono arisama ha? Youkaihenge ka?
translation: 汝怎会如此？妖怪变化？

original: Hanase, imasugu!
translation: 放开在下，现在立即！

original: Kikoenuka, hanase, ima... <zap>
translation: 听到了吗，放开，现在…<电击声>

original: Oh shit, oh shit, oh shit, oh shit...
translation: 妈的，妈的，妈的，妈的…

original: Gah! Look, just let me go, okay? This is crazy, this is like batshit unbelievable crazy. I didn't do anything, I don't know what you want with me.
translation: 嘿！让我走，好吗？这太疯狂了，这真的很疯狂。我什么都没做，我不知道你想要对我做什么。

original: Is this because of Anchorage? I swear, I didn't even want to be there, man. You've gotta believe me.
translation: 因为安克雷奇？我发誓，我不想去那里，伙计。你得相信我。

original: I didn't even WANT to be out in the field! I was hoping for a job in Washington, you know?
translation: 我完全不想上战场！你知道我当时想去华盛顿找工作的。

original: What? What do you want? I don't understand! Why is this happening to me??
translation: 什么？你要要什么？我不懂！我怎么会遇到这事？？

original: Where's my wife? Where's my boy? What've you done with them?
translation: 我的妻子呢？我的孩子呢？你对它们做了什么？

original: When I get free, so help me God I'm going to kill every last one of you!
translation: 上帝保佑，等我自由后，我要杀了你们所有人！

original: Agggh! What are you doing? What the hell do you want with us? LET ME GO!
translation: 啊！你在做什么？你他妈想要我们做什么？让我走！

original: And I'll go over here. I can be Stella Skyfire! She was Captain Cosmos' weapons specialist, back in season 2. This is great!
translation: 我会仔细检查这儿。我就像史黛拉·天火。她是《考斯莫思舰长》里的武器专家，早在第二季的时候。真是帅呆了！

original: Look, that must be the Captain's chair! You should sit there -- you can be Captain Cosmos!
translation: 快看，那肯定是舰长的座椅！你应该坐上去—你就像考斯莫思舰长！

original: Wow, look at this place! It looks like the ship in Captain Cosmos!
translation: 哇，看这里！它看起来就像《考斯莫思舰长》里面的飞船！

original: Uh-oh...
translation: 啊-喔…

original: We're stuck. Let me see if I can figure something out.
translation: 我们被困住了，让我看看我能不能想到点办法。

original: Wow! This looks just like the bridge on Captain Cosmos!  I know what to do!
translation: 哇！这看起来就像《考斯莫思舰长》里面的舰桥！我知道该做些什么了！

original: Somah, you go stand over there...
translation: 索玛，你在那里站好…

original: Mr. Elliott, you're there...
translation: 恩迪科特先生，你站在那里…

original: Paulson... you can be Jangles the Moon Monkey...
translation: 保尔森… 你就像月球泼猴贱垢厮…

original: and I get to aim the Death Ray!
translation: 而我负责校准死光！

original: Shit, they hit the core and sapped our power.  Look around for some buttons or something to restart the generators.
translation: 该死，它们打中了中枢，降低了我们的动力。找找按钮或别的什么东西来重启发电机。

original: Lights out, they killed our power!  Maybe there's some buttons or something around here to restart this hunk of junk.
translation: 灯灭了，它们切断了我们的动力！也许会有按钮或别的什么东西能让这堆破烂重新启动。

original: That looks like it's working, keep up whatever you're doing.
translation: 看起来它运转起来了，不管你做了什么，继续。

original: Things are flashing again! We got flashing things! You must be doing something right.  Keep it up!
translation: 灯又亮了！我们又有光了！你肯定做对了什么。继续！

original: I ain't no goddamn space monkey.
translation: 我不是什么该死的太空泼猴。

original: They just keep coming.
translation: 它们不断地杀过来。

original: This is almost fun.
translation: 真是爽透了。

original: Yippie ki yay.
translation: 咦咔呀。

original: This is just like the last time.
translation: 就像上次一样。

original: I think I'm actually getting the hang of this thing.
translation: 我想我已经找到怎么操作这玩意的感觉了。

original: When you really look, it doesn't seem that hard at all.
translation: 只要你用心，就没有什么能难得倒你。

original: Holy shit.  Where did that come from?
translation: 操。那是从哪冒出来的?

original: Why won't you work!
translation: 怎么不动啊！

original: Work damn you!
translation: 动啊，该死的！

original: I push this, it doesn't do anything, I push THAT, it doesn't... oh hey that did something.
translation: 按这个，没反应，按那个，也没……哦！那个好像有点用。

original: Oh man... what did you... why can't I feel my arms...
translation: 哦，伙计…你干了什么…为什么我的胳膊没知觉了…

original: ...wait... are those... are those MY ARMS? WHAT DID YOU DO? OH GOD, PUT THEM BACK! PUT THEM BACK ON!
translation: …等等…那些是…那是我的胳膊？你在了什么？天的！装回去！把他们给我装回去！

original: Just take it easy. If they wanted us dead, we'd be dead. They must need something from us.
translation: 放松点。如果它们要弄死我们，我们早就死了。它们一定要我们做什么。

original: Hey! I said, calm down! If they hear you they may come for us. Try and take it easy!
translation: 嗨！冷静点！如果它们听到你的话就要来抓我们了！

original: I said to SHUT UP! <slap>...  I'm... I'm sorry I did that. Please, forgive me. But we need to keep our heads on straight if we're going to survive.
translation: 我说闭嘴！<打耳光> 我很…我很抱歉这样对你。原谅我。不过我们要生存下去就要时刻保持头脑清醒。

original: What are we gonna do? They just threw me in this cell with you after they poked and prodded me and now I just hope they won't kill us.
translation: 我们怎么办？它们刚才对我又戳又刺的，现在又把我跟你丢到了一起，希望它们不要杀了我们。

original: Just take it easy. If they wanted us dead, we'd be dead. They must need something from us.
translation: 放松点。如果它们要弄死我们，我们早就死了。它们一定要我们做什么。

original: Yeah! They need us for FOOD or something! You saw that guy! He was all... cut open... like he'd been butchered! Oh my god! We're gonna be next!
translation: 对！它们应该把我们当作食物或什么的！你看那家伙！他就被整个…切开了…就像被屠宰了一样！天哪！我们就是下一个了！

original: Hey! I said, calm down! If they hear you they may come for us. Try and take it easy!
translation: 嗨！冷静点！如果它们听到你的话就要来抓我们了！

original: NO! GET US THE HELL OUT OF HERE! <pounding noise> SOMEONE! GET US OUT! PLEASE! <pounding noise>
translation: 不！带我离开这个鬼地方！！<砸墙声>有人吗？救我们出去！！求你了！

original: I said to SHUT UP! <slap>...  I'm... I'm sorry I did that. Please, forgive me. But we need to keep our heads on straight if we're going to survive.
translation: 我说闭嘴！<打耳光> 我很…我很抱歉这样对你。原谅我。不过我们要生存下去就要时刻保持头脑清醒。

original: Please, please. I just want to go home... I just want to go home...
translation: 救命，救命。我只想回家…我只想回家…

original: Hey now. No reason to get yourselves worked up. Whatever you need, I'm going to tell it to you.
translation: 嗨。没什么值得激动的。不论你需要什么，我都会把它告诉你的。

original: Well, I'm pretty sure you want me to talk into this thing, so here goes.
translation: 好的，我敢肯定你是想要我对着这东西说话，那么这就开始吧。

original: My name is Giles Wolstencroft... I'm the current Assistant Chief Executive Officer of the Vault-Tec Corporation.
translation: 我名叫贾尔斯·沃勒斯特卡夫特…我是现任避难所科技公司的助理首席行政官。

original: I was inspecting the construction site of Vault 76 when I was captured by what I can only assume are alien beings from another world.
translation: 当我被姑且假设是来自异界的外星人俘获时，我正在视察76号避难所的施工现场。

original: I'm not sure what they want from me, or what they will do to me, but whatever they need, I will readily provide.
translation: 我不确定它们要从我身上得到什么，它们会对我做什么。不过无论它们要什么，我都乐意提供。

original: Perhaps if I can bridge our communication gap and establish a rapport with them, we can enter into an exclusive trade agreement.
translation: 或许我可以为我们之间建设沟通的桥梁，以达成贸易协议。

original: In fact, instead of talking to this damn machine, I'm going to attempt to address them directly.
translation: 事实上，与其尝试去跟这样一台机器对话，不如直接和它们沟通。

original: On behalf of the Vault-Tec Corporation, I'd like to extend a heartfelt welcome to you. Wait... you don't need that... wait! WAIT! <zap>
translation: 我代表我们避难所科技有限公司，诚挚欢迎你们的到来。等一下…不必这样…等一下！等！一！下！<电击声>

original: Where am I? Where's my sister?
translation: 我在哪里？我姐姐在哪里？

original: I can hear some weird noises, but I can't see you. Why is it so dark in here? What's this machine? Please... someone talk to me!
translation: 我能听到些奇怪的声响，但我看不见你。为什么这那么黑？这是什么机器？拜托…有谁能回答我！

original: I want to go home! Please! Where's my mommy and daddy?! I just want to go home!
translation: 我想回家！拜托！我的爸爸妈妈呢？！我只是想要回家！

original: OW! That's bright! Ugh... wait... what... OH MY GOD! NOOOOOO! Stay away from me! GET AWAY!
translation: 哇！亮了！噢…等等… 什么…上帝！不！离我远点！远点！

original: Private Lawrence Mears, U.S. Army Medic, Serial Number 3476511.
translation: 二等兵劳伦斯·米尔斯，美国陆军医务兵，序号3476511。

original: AGH! Fuck! You... can do what...ever you want to me... I'm not saying jack sh...Stick it where the... sun don't shine...
translation: 啊！操！你…可以做什么…哪怕你想要对我…我都不会供出杰克把…把它放在那…太阳都照不到的地…

original: AGGGH! Oh my g... P-priv.. ate Law-lawrence M..mea..rs. U.S. Ar...army M-m-m...edic...
translation: 啊~~！！哦，我的上…二…等兵…劳…劳伦斯·米…米…尔斯。美国…陆…陆军…医…务兵…

original: I never thought I'd get to do something like this!
translation: 我从来没有想过我会有机会做这样的事！

original: Yeah, teach them a lesson!
translation: 耶，给它们点颜色看看！

original: This is like playing a holo-game, only better!
translation: 就像玩全息投影游戏，不过比那还过瘾！

original: This is my final message. If this doesn't work, I hope someone gets this recording and can bring it back to earth.
translation: 这就是我最后的留言了。如果不行，我希望听到这个录音的人有机会为我把它带回地球。

original: I've been able to figure out how to use some of the alien devices, like this recorder, and I think I know what they want with our world.
translation: 我已经掌握了一些外星人器械的使用方法，包括这个录音仪，而我也大概知道它们想从我们的世界得到什么。

original: They mean to take as many of us as they can and change us into... some sort of abomination. Many have been killed because of their experiments.
translation: 它们尽可能的把我们抓起来，然后把我们变成…某种合成兽。我们中的很多人已经在试验中死去。

original: They've been keeping us in cells, and then moving us one by one to their experimentation labs. I've managed to escape, but they are looking for me.
translation: 它们把我们关在监狱里，然后一个接一个地送去活体实验室。我尝试逃脱，可是它们正在搜捕我。

original: You've got to send help up here. As far as I can tell, they're never going to stop until they've captured hundreds... maybe thousands of us.
translation: 你们一定要带救援来。据我所知，它们在把成百上千…也许成千上万的人抓起来之前是绝对不会停下来的。

original: The good news is that they're totally reliant on technology. Without it, they're no tougher than you or I.
translation: 不过好消息是它们完全依赖科技。没有科技，它们其实就跟你我一样。

original: A small, well-equipped force could take this ship and free all of the prisoners on board. That's your best chance.
translation: 一小队装备精良的部队完全可以控制这艘飞船并且解放所有的人质。这就是你最好的机会。

original: I've got to keep moving, so I need to hide this tape. Good luck to all of us, and godspeed.
translation: 我得走了，我要把这个录音藏起来。祝我们都好运，一路平安。

original: Just wait until I tell Marsha and Karen about this! Imagine... I'm actually on a SPACEship!
translation: 等会我要把这的事告诉玛莎和卡伦！想想看…我真的站在宇宙飞船上了耶！

original: Oh, they're pointing at... oh, talk into this? What is this? Is this the space phone?
translation: 哦，它们指着…喔，对着这个讲吗？这是什么？太空电话吗？

original: Hey Marsh, this is Janet. You will NEVER guess where I am. Never. Ohhhh... I wish I could hear you, but I'll just tell you. I'M IN SPACE!
translation: 嗨，玛莎，我是珍妮，你绝对猜不到我现在在哪。你绝对猜不到。喔…我真想让到你猜猜，不过我还是告诉你吧。我在太空里！

original: I was driving along the highway when there was this light... and suddenly I'm on this real spaceship! No joke!
translation: 我在高速上开车时突然眼前一闪…我就在这太空船上了！不骗你！

original: Now these little green men are making all these noises and pointing at stuff trying to talk to me! I bet I'm the first one they've met!
translation: 现在这些小绿人又吵又闹的，指来指去一直想要跟我说话！我应该是它们见到的第一个人类。

original: So I figure I'll talk with them a while then I'll join you later and I can tell you all about it over lunch! Oh! If only I had my camera!
translation: 所以我想跟它们先聊一下，等一下我就去你，午饭时我可以跟你讲现在的事。对了，如果现在有相机就好了！

original: Well, they're pointing at some table with all sorts of gizmos sticking out of it. Gotta go. Kisses!
translation: 对了，它们正在指着一个桌子，上面有一些小东西。要走喽！亲！

original: Our defenses consist of 3 battalions of light infantry, 34 pieces of field artillery, 108 armored vehicles and 42 aerial vehicles.
translation: 我们的防御包括3个轻步兵营，34门重炮，108辆装甲车辆以及42个飞行单位。

original: We have 38 ICBM's always on alert and ready to fire when the word is passed down from the White House.
translation: 我们有38枚受命白宫随时准备发射的洲际导弹。

original: The codes to activate the launch sequences are... are... uhhngh.... no... I can't let you... uggh... get out of my mind!
translation: 发射导弹的密码是…是… 啊~~…不…我不能让你们…噢…从我的脑子滚出去！

original: Agggh! The c-codes... are... ugh.... no... I can't betray... AGH! My head! I can't... won't... AGGGGH! Agggh...
translation: 啊~~~！密…密码…是…噢…不…我不能背叛… 唔呃！我的头！我不能…我不会…啊~~~！啊~~~

original: I'm Holly Barrisford, a linguistics specialist for the U.S.S.A. I think I'm beginning to understand you, but you need to stop shocking me!
translation: 我是霍利·贝尔斯福德，美国太空总署的语言学专家。我已经开始明白你们的语言，请你们不要再电击我了！

original: Damn. I wish you could understand me. <Alien Noises>. Do you understand?
translation: 该死。我真希望你们能明白我在说什么。<模仿外星语>你们明白吗？

original: That's it. You get it. I mean you no harm, I just want to learn how to speak with you. Then perhaps we can discuss what you need from us.
translation: 那就对了。你明白了吧，我没有敌意，我只是在学着如何跟你们沟通。或许我们可以探讨一下你想从我们这里得到什么。

original: What are you doing with that needle? No! Get it away from me! NO! PLEASE! We can be friends! You don't need to... ahhhhh.
translation: 你要用那根针做什么？不！把它从我面前拿开！不！求你了！我们可以成为朋友！没有必要…啊~~~。

original: Well, this is just ridiculous! I demand to see whomever's in charge!
translation: 真荒唐！我要见你们的主管！

original: OW! What the? Do you have any idea who you're dealing with?!
translation: 啊！干什么？你知道你们现在在跟谁说话吗？

original: AGH! Stop it! I am a U.S. Senator and I warn you... if any harm comes to me, you'll bring the full wrath of the U.S. Military upon yourselves!
translation: 啊！住手！我是美国国会参议员。我现在警告你！如果你敢动我一条汗毛，我会动用整个美国的军事力量让你们尝尝愤怒的滋味！！

original: What? Where are you taking me?! Get your goddamn hands off of me! You'll all pay for this! The U.S. doesn't bargain with aliens!
translation: 什么？你要带我去哪里？把你的臭手从我身上拿开！你会因此付出代价的！美国是绝对不会跟外星人讨价还价的！！

original: Let's just get out of here.
translation: 我们赶快离开这里吧！

original: Yeah, you're probably right. Wait, did you feel that?
translation: 是的，你可能是对的。等等，你感觉到那个了吗？

original: What an incredible smell you've discovered...
translation: 这味道太难以置信…

original: Yeah, it is kinda stinky in here... Did you cut the cheese?
translation: 是啊，这里有点臭，你在切奶酪？

original: We're lost, aren't we?
translation: 我们迷路了，是不是？
